Apple Watch follow up→

December 17, 2015

Stephen Hackett reflects on the Apple Watch a few months on from his initial review. His summary of how he has started to lose interest in the watch confirms some of my initial worries about it. At no point in my day at work would I feel the need to access notifications on my wrist. If anything, the watch would just act as a distraction.

I would like to have notifications or the ability to play/pause media while on the move without having to take out my phone, but if this is my only use for the watch then I don’t think it’s worth looking into any time soon.
